Old conversation but *pushes up glasses*:

Though it is more likely a female praying mantis would eat her mate, that is only when they are hungry so if well fed enough, there is an even higher chance than the (approximately) 72% of surviving.
So if let's say you want to mate with a cute girl who is also a half praying mantis. What you would need to do to, most likely, survive is:
1. Feed your girl an English breakfast or anything that is filling. I chose english breakfast because it has the right amount of everything in the plate.
2. Do the thing but make it quick. Though you have just made her full from the filling food beforehand, there is still a chance she might get hungry whilst mating so making it quick and efficient will help you have a higher chance to survive.
3. Leave for about a day. Just wanna be safe, y'know?
Hope this helps you and your praying mantis gf live happily together. Until you accidentally forget one instruction...
